page.title: 13WILDLIFE IN DARLINGTON
page.content: The area we have to cover is 50% urban and 50% rural. In the urban part of our area we get the more common birds like blackbirds, sparrows, starlings and crows etc. In the woods around we get lots of squirrels and the occasional woodpecker.Birds like sparrows, bluetits,blackbirds and song thrushes have been found nesting in our school grounds this summer. The rural part is teaming with wildlife,birds & creatures like foxes, rabbits & squirrels.The birds are kestrels, owls & pheasants.Some creatures can survive in any area of land like voles, mice & rats.In the woodland on the edge of town there are woodpeckers,squirrels,weasels,stoats & badgers.Wild rabbits are found everywhere,because they burrow underground.{
